column5: Turkey's are in full mating mode in my backyard this week LOL
That's fantastic to see Lew. Great pic.
Critters in the yard are alwyas fun to watch!!!  Were just a bit north for turkeys, but ya never know!!  had them now and again!
Those tail feathers might be the right size to use on musky hooks?

Yeah, always enjoyable watching the wildlife doing their stuff and lemme know if you want a couple turkey's TJ, we've got all kinds around here. Some days I have about 25 in the yard and this morning I saw a flock of probably 50 in a farm field just down the road LOL
a couple of them are definitely showing off
They sure came back from near extinction well in southern ontario.  They are everywhere now.  Was it DDT that caused the downfall?  I know for birds of prey that was the issue.
very cool lew. there smart critters.
I guess they didn't fall out of a helicopter!
Oh the humanity! (One of the funniest skits from TV history)  Lets see how many of us are old enough to get the reference though.
I also remember them calling the golfer Chi Chi  Rod-ri-goose
"as God is my witness.....I thought they could fly"!
